mapper.select: select * from ( select a.id,a.title,a.description,a.create_time,'article' as postType from article a where DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y')=#{year} and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%m')=#{month} and a.publish = 1 union all select bn.id,bn.title,bn.description,bn.create_time,'bookNote' as postType from book_note bn where DATE_FORMAT(bn.create_time,'%Y')=#{year} and DATE_FORMAT(bn.create_time,'%m') = #{month} and bn.publish = 1) t order by t.create_time desc

select t.year,count(t.year) as count from ( select a.id,a.title,a.description,a.create_time,DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y') as year from article a where a.publish = 1 union all select bn.id,bn.title,bn.description,bn.create_time ,DATE_FORMAT(bn.create_time,'%Y') as year from book_note bn where bn.publish = 1) t group by t.year order by t.year desc
